name: Dark Scele CSUI
description: A dark theme made for scele.cs.ui.ac.id so it's comfortable to use at night. Yes, there are issues with text readability within span with custom inline background-color. Not much about it that this style can fix. You might want to set up a custom js injection to fix this (select all span with background-color, change either the text color or the background color). Feel free to reuse to the css to make a dark emas.ui.ac.id port (or anything else, really.) as long as you give me credit. Made by: --------------------------- M. Yusuf H from Tarung 2017
additional_info: 31 Mar 2021 Attempted to fix the span black text, fixed quiz result page colors. 28 Mar 2021 Made dark mode for quiz/questionnaire. 16 Mar 2021 Attempted to fix the span highlight text. 3 Mar 2021 Fixed questionnaire result page text. 7 Oct 2020 Added more selectors to allow more customization. 6 Oct 2020 Added color variables for easy customization.
